title: Trump says National Guard being removed from Chicago, LA and Portland
shortDescription: Trump announced on social media Dec. 31 that troops will be leaving the three Democratic-led cities, following a Supreme Court decision.

title: Trump says construction of giant arch will begin soon in DC
shortDescription: The president said in a Politico interview on Dec. 31 that his "Triumphal Arch" in Washington will begin construction in early 2026.

title: Boebert hits back after one of Trump's first vetoes targets Colorado
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has issued his first vetoes of his second term, including one that blocks the completion of a water pipeline in Colorado.

title: Trump's evolution on NYC mayor. Threatened arrest. Then Mamdani won.
shortDescription: Trump seized on Mamdani’s rise as one of the left’s leading figures to warn he spelled disaster for NYC. Then he won, and Trump changed his tune.

title: Trump’s immigration agenda includes denying birthright citizenship
shortDescription: On his first day in office, President Trump issued an EO that effectively denied birthright citizenship. Now SCOTUS must decide if that was legal.

title: Trump explores stripping citizenship of Somali-Americans in Minnesota
shortDescription: The Trump administration is exploring the denaturalization of Somali-Americans in Minnesota convicted of fraud, the White House press secretary said.

title: How Trump's tariffs have impacted American lives, pocketbooks
shortDescription: From bourbon-less cocktails to Brazilian coffee, Trump's tariffs stirred tensions among U.S. friends, foes. Is relief coming via $2,000 rebate checks?

title: Trump publicly touts CIA strikes that are normally kept quiet. Why?
shortDescription: In an unusual move, President Donald Trump announced a covert strike in Venezuela. It's not the first time he has publicly touted covert operations.

title: Why X is joining a First Amendment fight over a trans bathroom photo
shortDescription: X said an appellate court made a "misguided and dangerous" decision in ruling against a woman who posted a photo of a trans politician in a restroom.

title: Who's who in Donald Trump's family tree? He has had 3 wives
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's family has appeared with him in his various trips this year, but they all often come to the Mar-a-Lago NYE party. Who is who?

title: Pics of Trump’s NYE galas at Mar-a-Lago and celebrities who attended
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's Palm Beach, Florida, club Mar-a-Lago hosts a glitzy New Year's Eve party every year. See photos of Melania and Barron Trump.

title: Kennedy Center, coin, Peace Institute honor Trump with his name or image
shortDescription: Trump's name, face are being added to buildings in DC, potential coins, park passes. Mount Rushmore and Dulles airport were on the wish list. See updates

title: Trump admin can resume sharing Medicaid data with ICE, judge rules
shortDescription: A federal judge ruled that the Trump administration can resume sharing some Medicaid data with immigration authorities.
